text: Donnie Brasco is a 1997 American crime drama movie directed by Mike Newell. It stars Al Pacino and Johnny Depp. Michael Madsen, Bruno Kirby, James Russo, and Anne Heche appeared in supporting roles. It is based on the 1988 nonfiction book Donnie Brasco: My Undercover Life in the Mafia by Joseph D. Pistone. It was nominated for an Oscar for Best Adapted Screenplay. ==References== Category:1997 crime movies Category:1997 drama movies Category:American crime movies Category:American drama movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Mike Newell
title: Donnie Brasco (movie)
